job_description:
• 5–10 years of experience in semiconductor and/or facilities-related industries.
• Experience with global engineering standards and sustainability initiatives.
• Strong organizational, communication, and team collaboration skills.
• Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering.
• Expertise in high, medium, and low voltage systems, backup power, UPS, VFDs, lighting, and distribution systems.
• Proven ability to lead multi-functional teams and manage complex infrastructure projects.
• Ability to travel internationally 15–25% on average, up to 30% during critical phases.
• Familiarity with semiconductor manufacturing and facilities systems.
